caption.title: Benefits of plasticity on fitness components.
caption.p: A) on seed survival rate ( S seed ), and B) on seedling survival rate ( S sg ). A, SA, SWT, WT refer to the climate regions (see nomenclature in Fig. 1). For SWT, the Ord site (SWT Ord) and Auvergne site (SWT Auv) were analysed separately to account for the difference in S sg .
